attributes.action: Grant a Path to Citizenship for Migrants Seeking Safety in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Migrants who take dangerous journeys do so out of desperation, fleeing war, persecution, and extreme poverty. The UK has a moral duty to offer them safety and a chance to rebuild their lives. Granting them a pathway to citizenship recognizes their resilience, contributions, and the UK’s tradition of compassion and fairness.
attributes.background: We urge the UK Government to allow migrants arriving via dangerous journeys to apply for citizenship. Many flee war and persecution with no safe alternatives. Instead of criminalization, they deserve a fair asylum process, legal pathways, and a chance to contribute to society.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/717817
